tips.title: switch to renewable energy supplier
tips.description: cut your monthly bills and carbon footprint by switching to 100% renewable electricity providers like octopus energy or ecotricity.

tips.title: cut food waste with ai meal planning
tips.description: use ai to plan your meals based on what's already in your fridge. save money and reduce food waste every week.

tips.title: refill, don't rebuy
tips.description: switch to refillable cleaning and personal care products from local eco stores. you'll cut plastic and save over time.

tips.title: ditch the tumble dryer
tips.description: air-drying clothes saves money and extends their lifespan. use indoor racks or outdoor lines where possible.

tips.title: ai personalised local offers
tips.description: zai finds deals and cashback offers on eco food, travel, and clothes near you — tailored to your profile.

tips.title: eat more plants
tips.description: plant-based diets cost less and reduce emissions. cut meat and dairy by half and save money each week.

tips.title: walk or cycle short trips
tips.description: replace short car journeys with walking or cycling. better for you, the planet, and your fuel bills.

tips.title: switch to a green bank
tips.description: move your money to a bank that doesn't invest in fossil fuels. it's free and sends a powerful message.

tips.title: buy preloved instead of new
tips.description: from tech to fashion, preloved saves money and cuts waste. use local apps or zai's suggestions.

tips.title: track your spending & co₂ in one
tips.description: connect your bank with zai to track your carbon and financial impact — spot where to save instantly.
